She did leave in the post before read the post. And I am dwelling on the past 
because this happens every time seemingly. Some person makes a decision and 
if they dont like the consequences they have to be made happy. Well thats 
fucking gay ok rauq? It is if someone makes a decision they must live with 
it, and you know what If I have to ignore what deal was made that long ago 
then I guess BK has to be back in the infecticon base because then it wouldnt 
be fair to every other player and every other charachter that never had 
choices. From what I can tell is that you try to appease the biggest 
whinners. "Oh I dont like whats happening now that I did that lets ignore it 
and pretend it never happened k?" That is bull shit of the highest degree and 
when Hugar didnt say no he did say yes he could have said no and he didnt he 
asked me what I was going to do in the post, I told him, and he did say no to 
it at all. If you really want to be a good council member rauq and let the 
RPG develop then let charachters live through the choice they make. No 
changing of anything, the past sets what happens you can change the past just 
like you said and if a deal was made then then it is jsut as strong now. I 
for one am tired of people whining about something their chars did to have a 
negative effect on them and then suddenly it all gets ersed. Airly made a 
choice now she has to lvie with that choice. That is the bottom line. And If 
I have to change anything well then I guess we can change it to BK having 
died in the base as that was what would have ultimately happened. A player 
can't go killing a stotyline because they made a bad decision thats not how 
things work. All I ever see from the council is trying to make the more 
popular members happy, if airly wants something done to get her chars out of 
a bad situation, it happens, dtto for tankor, abyss, and other people.

--part1_6f.1c6c73d2.290490c1_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
